documentation.text:
@title PiggyBank
 @dev A time-locked savings contract where users can deposit ETH and withdraw only after lock period

@dev Create a piggy bank with a lock duration in seconds
 @param _lockDurationInSeconds Duration to lock the funds (e.g., 86400 for 1 day)
@dev Add more funds to existing piggy bank
@dev Withdraw funds after lock period expires

@dev Emergency withdrawal with penalty (loses 10% of funds)
 Use this only in real emergencies!

@dev Check how much time is left until withdrawal
 @return timeLeft seconds remaining, 0 if unlocked
@dev Get piggy bank details for a user
@dev Get current block timestamp (useful for frontend)
@dev Helper function to calculate lock time for common durations

devdoc.details: A time-locked savings contract where users can deposit ETH and withdraw only after lock period

addFunds().details: Add more funds to existing piggy bank

createPiggyBank(uint256).details: Create a piggy bank with a lock duration in seconds

params._lockDurationInSeconds: Duration to lock the funds (e.g., 86400 for 1 day)

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdrawal with penalty (loses 10% of funds) Use this only in real emergencies!

getCurrentTime().details: Get current block timestamp (useful for frontend)

getLockDuration(string).details: Helper function to calculate lock time for common durations

getPiggyBank(address).details: Get piggy bank details for a user

getTimeLeft(address).details: Check how much time is left until withdrawal

withdraw().details: Withdraw funds after lock period expires

devdoc.title: PiggyBank
